runs.comm: starts with a short and very wide one that sways away
short of a length ball just outside off, a little too short perhaps, Gambhir punches that crisply through the covers off the back foot, nearly sends it all the way to the rope
picthed up this time, a bit of width, Sehwag swings at it and sends it down towards third man for a single

tight line around off this time, Gambhir drops the ball towards point and sets off for a quick single, Sehwag and Gambhir aren't the greatest of runners between the wickets, but Gambhir loves these quick singles early in his innings, Sehwag has to put the skates on, and Afghanistan nearly gave away four overthrows there, but a good bit of backing up prevents any extra runs
opens the face and guides it towards third man for a single
pitched up and down the leg side, Gambhir could have glanced that for four, but he misses
shortish ball, Gambhir goes for the pull, but he's beaten for pace and is struck on the body, the TV says that was 150.3kph, that figure seems a bit exaggerated though

nearly a wicket first ball there, Gambhir could have been out twice off that delivery, first he almost spooned a catch to mid-off as he looked to play the ball to square leg, the leading edge drops short of the charging fielder, he would have been easily run-out there as well, the throw misses and he survives
on the pads, worked towards square leg
no feet at all from Sehwag, it was short and wide, and usually Sehwag would have dispatched that to the deep point boundary, he misses out this time
another leading edge, this was pitched up by Zadran, Sehwag was looking to work that to the leg side from the off stump, edged behind backward point, not the most assured of starts here
wrong line, Gambhir missed out once in the previous over, this time he doesn't, it was on the pads, short of a length, glanced fine for four

Zadran grunts as he delivers that one, full and outside off, inside edge this time and the fizzes in the direction of short fine leg, after ricocheting off the keeper's pad, it bounced twice before it reached the keeper, India not middling it too often here

Gambhir's played on here, Shapoor has struck, in recent times Gambhir's problems have been generally been with the outside edge, this time it is the inside edge as he pokes at the ball, middle stump is reclining on the ground, it was a short of length ball just outside off, Gambhir's feet doesn't move much as he plays that weak prod

pitched up, Kohli oozing confidence as he drives his first ball towards extra cover, there was a direct hit at the non-striker's end as Sehwag turns back after thinking of a single, he's made it by a few inches
short of a length ball outside off, steers it down to third man for a single
beaten outside off, 131.6kph, Sehwag waits on the back foot as the back of length ball bounces and carries on with the angle outside off, Sehwag doesn't get bat on it
Sehwag doesn't stop going for his shot even if he has just been beaten, that was a length ball on the pads, a lofted whip to the midwicket boundary
and back to being beaten outside off, Afghanistan bowlers posing a few questions here
short of length ball outside off, Kohli gets forward and defends to the off side
not quite off the middle of the bat there, a length ball around off, a thick outside edge in front of point
back of a length ball angling in towards middle and leg, Kohli looks to work that one away but is struck on the thigh pad
Dawlat grunts again, punched towards point, Afghanistan's fielding has been sharp today

fifth dot ball in a row, scratch that, there is an overthrow, crashed off the front foot towards cover, bounces awkwardly towards Nabi, who gets his body in the way, struck on the knee as he stops it, then there's a shy at the stumps at the striker's end, which results in a free run
Sehwag edges the final ball of the over behind backward square leg, just two off the over

wicket number two for Shapoor, India's openers worrying form continues, this was just outside off, Sehwag wafts and gets a thin edge through to the keeper, Sehwag waits on the back foot, doesn't move his feet at all as he opens the face a touch to try work the ball to the off side
there was plenty of bounce on that one, some movement away as well
solidly defended off the front foot towards cover
back of a length ball outside off, Yuvraj remains watchful
same length, just outside off, dabbed towards point, Shapoor getting some good bounce here

what a way to get your first runs! a dazzling hit from Yuvraj, effortlessly swung for six over the bowler's head, a clean strike that hits the middle of the bat and lands near the sightscreen, top shot
defends the final ball of the over
pitched up and driven back towards the bowler
lovely stroke, from Kohli this time, driven on the up, doesn't try to power it too much, it races through to the cover boundary, this guy is in some form
struck on the pads as he looks to work the ball to the leg side, that was sliding down
drilled towards mid-off for a single
length ball on off stump, Afghanistan haven't bowled too many loose deliveries today, defended down the track by Yuvraj
Yuvraj mistimes this one, down the ground and it hits the stumps at the non-striker's end
Karim Sadiq starts with a length ball, worked towards midwicket for a single
punched off the front foot towards sweeper cover
full ball on the stumps, eased towards long-on for a single
pitches it up again, driven down to long-on for one more
a touch shorter but on the pads, worked towards square leg for one more
length ball on middle and off, worked towards mid-on, the bowler Sadiq has to do the fielding, he scurries after that one but can't prevent a second
driven towards cover off the front foot
another single, again to long-on
pitched up on the pads, a flamboyant flick towards deep square leg, doesn't bother keeping it on the ground
slower ball is helped along once more to long-on for a single
a splendid hit from Kohli, dead straight, over the sightscreen, that was a length ball just outside of off, Kohli launches that one over the bowler's head, 93m that one travelled
slower ball, Kohli skips down the pitch, decides against the big hit and pushes it back towards the bowler
another single to long-on, the preferred area for singles it seems
drilled powerfully down the ground, dances down the pitch and drives it a touch uppishly to the right of long-off, four more to Kohli
pushed towards cover for a single
sensible from Yuvraj, eases the ball towards long-off for one more
worked towards long-on this time, another single, runs off every ball this over
a full toss outside off, Yuvraj doesn't make the most of it, muscles it towards long-off for a single
length ball on the pads from offspinner Mohammad Nabi, worked towards midwicket for a single
full on middle and leg, single to long-on

dropped, tough chance that, a flighted ball is powered back by Yuvraj, it flies to the left and over the bowler's head, Nabi gets his hand on it but can't latch on, he does well to recover though, and fields the ball and shies at the stumps, a direct hit and Kohli was a goner at the non-striker's end
leg-side wide
again down the leg side
that one spins across, an edge from Yuvraj, towards backward point for a single
gets forward and pushes that towards cover for one more
a third wide down the leg side, there is a mild appeal for a stumping, but Yuvraj had grounded his back leg
keeps that outside leg line, off the thigh pad towards short fine for a run
Yuvraj falls, he chops a ball outside off to short third man, some glimpses of the old Yuvraj in that innings, but it ends at 18, he looked to power that one, but he slices it through to the fielder
Raina starts by pushing an offstump ball to point for a single
shortish ball outside off, defended towards cover
fired in full and towards the blockhole, pushed towards mid-off
length ball on the pads, whipped towards deep square leg by Kohli
short ball, Kohli skips down the track and works it towards mid-on

dropped, Afghanistan have been very good in the field today, this was a simple chance and the bowler should have pouched it, a length ball is punched back to the bowler, a dolly for him as the ball loops towards him, right at his body, put down
outside off and nearly edged to the keeper
dropped it a bit short and that is pulled towards long-on
danced down the wicket and driven towards extra cover
lashed down the ground by Kohli, once more Kohli gets an on-the-up drive to the right of the mid-off fielder, plenty of power on that one
on the pads, nearly chips it to the man at midwicket

oh Afghanistan, another drop, Kohli looks to hammer that one over wide long-on, he doesn't get enough distance on it, the fielder is there, should have got in position to take that one much earlier, but Sami can only push it over the rope as he is unbalanced when the ball arrives, should have taken that one, Kohli is not a man you want to give an extra chance to, not when he is in this form
pitched up and that is eased to long-on
punched down the ground by Raina, bowler dives in an attempt to stop that one but can't
flat and outside off, Kohli gets back and hits it wide of extra cover
short of length ball angling in towards the body, nudged towards midwicket

Kohli is one of the best when it comes to hitting towards extra cover, he shows that again here, he charges out and lofts that over extra cover, doesn't bother keeping it down, the fielder at long-off races to his left but can't get near the ball
a full toss and Shapoor gets away with it, Kohli edges it towards midwicket, Kohli swings his bat in frustration at missing out on that one
straight as they come! Raina doesn't bother getting to the bounce of the ball, launches that one on the up, straight towards the sightscreen, bounces before reaching the rope

a Twenty20 heave from Raina, he gets a boundary though he didn't time it too well, it was a poor delivery from Shapoor, a high full toss on the stumps, basically asking Raina to put it away wherever he wants to, Raina loves the midwicket heave
slower ball outside off, guided towards short third man
full and wide, sliced away by Raina, who wanted to send that towards cover but gets it instead behind deep point for four
flighted and full outside off, muscled towards long-off by Raina, who calls for two, but then realises there is time only for one
flighted and full again, this time on middle and leg stump, pushed towards mid-on
on off stump, eased towards long-on for a single
full ball is worked to long-on for one more

dropped, and he never seemed like he was going to catch it, an awful stroke from Raina, gets a leading edge as he was looking to dispatch the ball to the leg side, that swirls high towards point, the fielder, who is the 12th man, never looked like he had that one under control, finds he has to dive at the last moment to get his hands on it, put down again
pitched up and that is hammered towards point, no run for that effort
full slower ball outside off, slapped towards sweeper cover
Kohli gets to his fifty, as he seems to in virtually every match these days, it was a high full toss that was slammed down the ground

Afghanistan have held on to the the catch this time! Kohli looks to launch that one over long-off, seemed to have hit it quite well, but it doesn't have the legs, long-off latches on to it, it's Nabi who take a terrific overhead catch, and immediately signals to the crowd in celebration, huge wicket that, it was a
short of length ball on leg stump, defended to the leg side
swings it to backward square leg for a single
Raina skips down the track and sends the ball towards long-off
driven along the ground towards long-off for a single

full ball outside off, and that is crashed towards sweeper cover, and another mistake in the field by the man in the deep, he doesn't bend enough to get his hand on the ball, a boundary results, and the fielder seems to have pulled his hamstring as well
that was fired down the leg side, Raina looks to swing that one, off the pads
flatter and on a length outside off, poked towards backward point
trashes this one down the ground, Dhoni can't get out of the way of that one, so only a single after the ball crashes into him, he doesn't seem to be hurt though
full ball outside leg stump, Raina makes room and looks to power it down the ground, can't beat the bowler
that Raina midwicket heave makes an appearance again, that was a length ball outside leg stump, dismissed by Raina

down the leg side once more, Raina was looking to swipe that to square leg, seems to have hit his thigh pad and almost deflected onto the stumps, called a wide though, the ball rolls towards backward point
punched back towards the bowler
full ball outside off, guided towards short third man
full ball on off stump, eased to mid-off for a single
low full toss, Dhoni can't get under that one, thumps it towards long-on
round the wicket, full and too wide outside off
better this time, keeps it full, outside off again but it is closer to the stumps, Raina looks to jab that to the off side but can't connect
this isn't good from Afghanistan, that was a shortish ball down the leg side, a dive from the replacement keeper isn't enough to stop it running to the boundary
a near yorker outside off, Raina again can't connect, the keeper having a tough time
full and on middle stump this time, punched towards mid-off
over the wicket, a length ball, sat up for MSD, bludgeons it to the wide long-on boundary
back of length ball outside off, Dhoni can't time it as looks to muscle it down the ground
power from Raina, a full toss on the pads, Raina skips away from leg stump and hammers that to the wide long-on boundary
poor ball, several feet down the leg side, 14 wides this innings
not a bad comeback though, Nabi has Raina bowled, Raina was charging down looking for the big hit, he misses and that crashes into off stump
a low full toss on off stump, to midwicket for a single
superb delivery that, a pinpoint yorker, even Dhoni, who is perhaps the best hitter of the yorker in world cricket, can't do anything with that except block it
MSD power, another attempted yorker, this time Dhoni gets under it, absolutely murders it down the ground, no stopping that one
a gift to finish off the innings, a juicy full toss is slammed over midwicket for a six, Dhoni finishes the innings in style, India end on 159
